summary: Im gonna live in my bubble that Jon saw Arya and distracted the dragon so she can reach Bran. Im gonna live in my bubble that my...
body: Im gonna live in my bubble that Jon saw Arya and distracted the dragon so she can reach Bran. Im gonna live in my bubble that my son screamed GO to his bb sister to go and slay that mother f^^% and save their brother. We got ONE scene with Jon/Arya for 3 episodes, one scene with Sansa/Arya and one with all of them where they barely talk. Like the house stark is kicking ass and takes names but at what cost?

summary: Wow, Game of Thrones season 8 episode 3 “The Long Night” was really epic! I loved the battle and the girls did the best and...
caption:
Wow, Game of Thrones season 8 episode 3 “The Long Night” was really epic!

I loved the battle and the girls did the best and killed the worst ones! 

I can’t believe Arya killed the Night King, thought it’d be Jon, it looked like it would be but then she came out of nowhere and killed him so all the other White Walkers died. 

Although, I must say, I did think the battle against them would be the final battle of the show overall and maybe after someone had got the Throne and it would’ve last more than one episode. They were made out to be like the big bad of the show and I thought it’d be like a battle over the course of several episodes at the very end of the show and killing the Night King would maybe be the last thing we saw before the credits rolled of the last episode. I would’ve liked that, that would’ve been a good ending.

I can’t wait to see how it ends though, even if it’s not how I thought it’d be <3

Kit Harington and Nikolaj Coster-Waldau <3

summary: If you listen and watch carefully, it could totally look like Jon actually saw Arya trying to get to the Godswood and since...
body:
Jon helped Arya (?)

If you listen and watch carefully, it could totally look like Jon actually saw Arya trying to get to the Godswood and since Viserion was watching the entrance, he could have gotten up to distract him and when it seemed like he was screaming nonsense he could have actually been yelling “GO!”

And my friends, if this is true, then it means my duo of siblings really somehow came together to end the long night and Jon helped Arya to get where she needed to be to kill the Night King AND I WILL LITERALLY FLING MYSELF INTO THE SUN BECAUSE THEY’D BE BOTH HEROES FOR THE DAWN.

tags: kind of reminds me of the rickon run
summary:
Jon hesitating for Sam, but continuing to run towards the Weirwood to get to Bran is lowkey a huge moment for him.
He loves Sam,...
body:
Jon hesitating for Sam, but continuing to run towards the Weirwood to get to Bran is lowkey a huge moment for him.

He loves Sam, but Bran is his brother. And he knows that’s where the Night King will be, so he keeps going.

reblog.comment:

He loves Sam, but Bran is his brother. And he knows that’s where the Night King will be, so he keeps going.

blog.name: rainhadaenerys
blog.title: Daenerys Targaryen is the love of my life

summary: Posting this for the fourth time to see if maybe, just maybe, Tumblr will let this stay in the tags. DAENERYS AND JON, THEIR...
body:
Posting this for the fourth time to see if maybe, just maybe, Tumblr will let this stay in the tags.

DAENERYS AND JON, THEIR PARALLELS, AND THEIR JOURNEYS AS LEADERS AND RULERS

There are many metas detailing the parallels between Jon and Dany. But I don’t think I’ve seen many that focus on their actions as leaders and rulers. And often, I read things like “Jon and Dany complement each other because Dany is a conqueror and Jon is an administrator/ruler”, or things like “Jon is a rebuilder and Dany is a destroyer”, and I feel like these are not good assessments of Jon and Dany. So I wanted to write my own Jon/Dany parallel meta, showing both their general parallels, and how similar I think these two are as rulers, and where I think they differ.

In this meta, I won’t talk about the foreshadowing for Jon and Dany’s romantic relationship, only about their parallels. Even then, this is still a very long meta, but I think it’s worth it, because Jon and Dany have tons of parallels (to me, it’s almost as if they were the same character having the same story in different locations), and I think their parallels are fascinating.

These are the topics of this meta:

General Parallels

Jon and Dany becoming leaders

Jon and Dany as rulers

Jon and Dany are both conquerors

Compromises and Identity Crisis

Conclusion

Link to the full meta

summary: Even though Jon didn't kill the Night King himself, he is the reason the whole westeros is safe, he was the one who united...
body: Even though Jon didn’t kill the Night King himself, he is the reason the whole westeros is safe, he was the one who united everyone to fight against the common enemy, he gave up his crown and pride to save the people, he goes to an extent of wight hunt to prove that the threat was real. He is the real hero, it doesn’t matter who made the killing move, jon was the only person who fought for the survival instead of throne. And at the end of the day I’m happy that a Stark killed the NK.

reblog.comment: Even though Jon didn’t kill the Night King himself, he is the reason the whole westeros is safe, he was the one who united everyone to fight against the common enemy, he gave up his crown and pride to save the people, he goes to an extent of wight hunt to prove that the threat was real. blog.name: demonqueenbee
blog.title: They call me B. 25yo who likes do draw and write .

body:
Spoilers

I love the starks. I love them all but God dang the men were all so dumb. They had their talents but the men lacked political intelligence, all of them. Hence why I think Jon is kind of done with his arc.

For example:

Ned died cuz he was dumb enough to pick a battle with a mad queen in her territory. Dumb. Love ya bed but ya fucked up

Robb, ah romantic robb. Marrying your love was beautiful and like we all want love to win in the end but it got you killed. Dumb move, should have listened to your mama.

Bran. You were a dumb kid who didnt listen to your mama. You kind of got the chance to learn from it, I guess. Ur less dumb but you’re kinda creeping me out.

Jon, what was with the yelling. Boy you got so much charisma, you are such an amazing leader but you’re not the greatest at tact and strategy ( let me bend thr knee right after I got crowned king by my people, let me tell my lover I’m her nephew). You have your moments and if you got you’re head out of your ass , you would be the best king.

trail.content:
Spoilers

I love the starks. I love them all but God dang the men were all so dumb. They had their talents but the men lacked political intelligence, all of them. Hence why I think Jon is kind of done with his arc.

For example:

Ned died cuz he was dumb enough to pick a battle with a mad queen in her territory. Dumb. Love ya bed but ya fucked up

Robb, ah romantic robb. Marrying your love was beautiful and like we all want love to win in the end but it got you killed. Dumb move, should have listened to your mama.

Bran. You were a dumb kid who didnt listen to your mama. You kind of got the chance to learn from it, I guess. Ur less dumb but you’re kinda creeping me out.

Jon, what was with the yelling. Boy you got so much charisma, you are such an amazing leader but you’re not the greatest at tact and strategy ( let me bend thr knee right after I got crowned king by my people, let me tell my lover I’m her nephew). You have your moments and if you got you’re head out of your ass , you would be the best king.

blog.name: orangeflavoryawp
blog.title: orangeflavor
blog.description:
I live deliriously.  Sometimes I write about it.
My Fanfiction
My KoFi

title: Upcoming Jonsa snippet
body:
For the anon who sweetly asked for a snippet of my next piece.  <3  Should be posting soon.  Work is busy, but these two have got me good.  Can’t stop writing them.

* * *

He heaves a long, tight breath, seeming to consider his words before he lets them taste air.  “You have to be careful, Sansa.  Far more careful than you are now.”

She takes another daring step.  She could touch him if she wished, stretch her arm out and graze the fur of his cloak – the cloak she sewed for him those many moons ago in the midst of her floundering, fledging affection for a brother she hadn’t thought to need quite so desperately as she does now.

(And not so nearly like a ‘brother’, as she should.)

She presses her tongue to the roof of her mouth, leveling him with a steady stare.  “I’ve afforded her no less than the proper decorum required.”

“Aye, and no more either.”  He throws her a withering look.

“And what more should I give?  What more can she demand when she already has my home and my people and my brother – my brother – and I… I…”  She takes another step, and without warning, they’re back to breathing each other’s air, and she doesn’t realize how they’ve gotten back to this point, to this closeness, to this hesitant pulse of space between them – more than an exhale but less than a step – this tangle of air that seems to pull at their lungs, tugging, dragging – mauling them with its intensity –  until they’re steeped in each other’s scent and their skin is singing beneath the madness and every possible way she could touch him is right there in her grasp and –

“But I’m not your brother.”

The chasm has never been so wide.

Jon’s eyes widen at his unconscious release, mouth opening, and then closing, his gaze drifting down to the floor a moment.

Sansa tastes bile at the back of her tongue. She nods, breathing deeply, trying to stem the wetness dotting the corners of her eyes.  “You’re right.”

Jon’s head snaps up at her words.

“You’re right, I’m sorry.”  She shakes her head, rubs at her temples, tries to steady her breathing.  “You’re right.”

Jon’s eyes are searching hers, his breath stilled in his chest, something desperate and hopeful seeming to hang at the tip of his tongue.

“My half-brother,” she corrects, and she watches as he closes in on himself instantly, his face a shuddered mask of war-worn exhaustion once again, the ire leaving him so suddenly it’s like a visible exhale of his body.

blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: Stupid
description:
by ABK02

Arya Stark takes sixteen years to make a friend, but when she does, she’s glad it was him. But it doesn’t take long for those feelings to change, and Arya does not know what to do.

Words: 3455, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin, Game of Thrones (TV)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Arya Stark, Gendry Waters, Jon Snow, Sansa Stark, Bran Stark, Rickon Stark, Ned Stark, Robert Baratheon, Joffrey Baratheon, Cersei Lannister
  • Relationships: Arya Stark/Gendry Waters, Jon Snow/Arya Stark, Joffrey Baratheon/Sansa Stark, Sandor Clegane/Sansa Stark, Arya Stark & Ned Stark
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - High School
